Text:
Thanks for your efforts
This looks good
Spiral Season 3 starts soon on BBC Four.
Thanks for the upload but just watched the first episode and the file seems to be corrupted with a couple of bits missing and gaps in the storyline.  Hopefully the rest will be ok.
Many Thanks For Your Efforts. I hope I get more series.

Thanks. Appreciate your work. Some minor problems e.g towards end of episode 1 a little picture "static", and episode 7 finishes a bit early but story line maintained. Have yet to check other episodes. I can put up with minor problems.
